caption.p: Expression of growth hormone (GH) and insulin growth factor I (IGF-I) in the muscle ( A) and TNF-α, IL1-β and IL-8 in the head kidney ( B) of common carp fed on diets with 0 (control), 0.25%, 0.50%, 1.0% and 1.5% neroli oil (NO). n = 6 X ± SD. a,b,c Within a row mean values with different letters are significantly different from the other groups ( p < 0.05).
